name: CHESS SPARTA (2015)
description:
This is a simplest strategy game

-  The game is to aim for a high score.

- If the king is taken, you lose.

- You CAN USE the pieces you have taken.

-The video will give you some idea of the other detailed rules.

(First Release: Spring 2015　- No modifications have been made as of the time of release.)

- I am thinking of renewing my game-playing equipment since its specs have gone up considerably.

-  I am releasing another simple and different strategy for the iPhone, check us out on Twitter.
